description.en: The talented detective Rankotaro, who immediately set out to solve the case, found out that the kidnapping of a boy that occurred during the investigation, the murder threat to the kindergarten principal was the murder of Kimura, and a series of incidents, and that it was a plot by the monster Cobra Mask. Ta. However, on the verge of discovering the truth of the case, Ranko Taro is trapped by Cobra Mask and loses his life! [Explanation] "Nanairo Kamen " is the first memorable Toei Kamen Hero work, using Yasunori Kawauchi, the author of "Moonlight Mask", which took the world by storm. This work, which was broadcast on Japan Educational Television for about a year from June 1959, depicts a fierce battle between the messenger of justice, the seven-colored mask, and the strange monsters who threaten peace, and is known as "Moonlight Mask" by children. Gain unrivaled support. In addition, the truth of the incident has the theme of human ugly desire and strong love, and it is a masterpiece that can be appreciated by adults. This book is the first official book that summarizes the full story of the manga version serialized in Kodansha's monthly boy magazine "Bokura" in parallel with the TV drama broadcast. The artist is Daiji Ichimine. Later, he worked on many manga adaptations of special effects works such as "National Kid" and "Ultra Seven", and since he is praised as a master of comicalization, this work can be said to be one of his successes. Like the TV version, it consists of 7 parts in total, and after changing the title of "New Seven Colored Masks" in which the main character was changed from Susumu Hashima to Shinichi Chiba, the manga version followed suit and changed the title from Part 6 onwards.
